definition: 4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: It symbolizes good fortune, Gangnam civil called "the head of wealth."
sentences.chinese: 它象徵着吉祥，江南民間稱之爲“富貴不斷頭”。

sentences.english: The Maybach has been adopted as the ultimate status symbol by Russia's super-rich.
sentences.chinese: 邁巴赫被視作俄國超級富豪的”終極身份象徵“。

sentences.english: But for now, a symbolic moment is about to occur.
sentences.chinese: 但在眼下，一個象徵性的時刻即將出現。

sentences.english: In Chapter 1, the concerned symbolic literary theories are introduced here synoptically.
sentences.chinese: 第一章對象徵文學理論進行了概括性的介紹。

sentences.english: Color symbol, the blue symbolizes joy and win loyal to our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 色象徵歡樂和勝利，藍色象徵忠於祖國。

sentences.english: Color symbol, the blue symbolizes joy and win loyal to our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 色象徵歡樂和勝利，藍色象徵忠於祖國。

sentences.english: For example, scarabs in the form of the beetle insect were believed to be the symbol of new life.
sentences.chinese: 例如，甲殼蟲外形的聖甲蟲被認爲是新生的象徵。

sentences.english: Appollo stood for youth and manly beauty.
sentences.chinese: 阿波羅象徵着青春和陽剛之美。

sentences.english: In Singapore, the merlion is the symbolic of the country.
sentences.chinese: 在新加坡，魚尾獅是這個國家的象徵。

sentences.english: Lushen ( a goddess in Chinese myth) was a symbol of feeling and desire.
sentences.chinese: 洛神原型是情與欲的象徵。

sentences.english: His symbol was fire and a blacksmith's hammer.
sentences.chinese: 他的象徵是火和鐵匠的錘子。

sentences.english: In feudal society, the dragon also be regarded as a symbol of the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在封建社會，龍更被視作帝王的象徵。

sentences.english: In Chinese opinion, panda signifies peace.
sentences.chinese: 熊貓在中國人的心目中象徵着和平。

sentences.english: Enter a nickname that indicates you are away.
sentences.chinese: 輸入一個象徵您已經離開的暱稱。

sentences.english: It is this southern city of Guangzhou Cultural and artistic taste of a symbol.
sentences.chinese: 它是廣州這座南國都市文化和藝術品位的一種象徵。

definition: lantern with carousel of paper horses, rotating under convection, used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节/fig. constant busy circulation of people
